title: What to Expect
subtitle: Join us for an immersive quantum computing experience with workshops, talks, and hands-on challenges.

features.title: Quantum workshops
features.description: Hands-on sessions exploring <purple>Qiskit</purple> and quantum computing basics for all levels.

features.title: Expert talks
features.description: Hear from IBM researchers and quantum computing professionals.

features.title: Networking events
features.description: Meet peers, join team challenges, and connect with the <blue>Quantum community</blue>.

features.title: Quantum Hackathon
features.description: Solve real-world challenges using Qiskit on actual quantum hardware.

features.title: Valuable Awards
features.description: Awards & certificates are presented to participants by the President of SKKU and IBM Quantum.
